this_title: Rock Hudson: Dark and Handsome Stranger
trans_title: 洛克·赫德森：英俊陌生人
introduction: Rock Hudson has embodied the symbol itself of the masculinity: tall, slim and muscular, with a sweet and deep voice. His shiny black hair, glittering eyes, high cheekbones and sensual lips, made Rock Hudson one of the sexiest stars of Hollywood. Twenty-five years ago, just before  his sixtieth birthday, Hudson died for deseases connected to AIDS. He was the first big Hollywood star to die for HIV. And the first one to declare to be infected. But who was Rock Hudson truly?
chinese_title: 洛克·赫德森：英俊陌生人
foreign_title: Rock Hudson: Dark and Handsome Stranger
